name: Dislocation
storyline:
You wake up on an early morning to a loud bang. You quickly get up to see everyone is still asleep. Looking outside, you see that your home village's windmill has burst into flames. You rush over and find a weird glove on the ground. You pick it up, but before you can turn around to get out, you feel a hard blow to your head, and you pass out. 
 
After waking up, you will soon learn everything around you has changed dramatically. You must stop the evil force that as awaken, and you must go through worlds, solving puzzles to get through them. Along the way you will make allies and enemies on your journey through the world of Dislocation.
summary:
This is a 3D Sci-Fi Puzzle game about you, the player, who finds a glove that allows them to 'dislocation' objects to get through puzzles in an unknown planet far away. A great evil awaits your arrival. 
 
You must 'warp' objects in order to get past them, by moving them in a certain direction, changing their size, or even changing their place in time by using your new found glove.
